name: Gross Profit Margin
description: Percentage of revenue retained after accounting for cost of goods sold

name: Operating Profit Margin
description: Percentage of revenue retained after accounting for all operating expenses

name: Cash Flow from Operations
description: Net cash generated from core business operations

name: Return on Investment
description: Return generated on capital invested in the business

name: Order Fill Rate
description: Percentage of customer orders fulfilled completely and on time

name: Stock-Out Instances per SKU
description: Number of times each SKU was out of stock during the period

name: Backorder Volume
description: Total volume of orders that could not be fulfilled due to stock unavailability

name: Forecast Accuracy
description: Accuracy of demand forecasting compared to actual sales

name: SKU-Wise Sales vs Planned Production Variance
description: Variance between actual sales and planned production for each SKU

name: Plant Utilization Rate
description: Percentage of time production facilities are actively producing

name: Production Cycle Time
description: Average time to complete one production cycle

name: Inventory Turnover Ratio
description: Number of times inventory is sold and replaced in a given period

name: Finished Goods Inventory by SKU
description: Current inventory levels for each finished product SKU

name: Scrap/Wastage Rate
description: Percentage of materials lost during production process

name: On-Time Dispatch Rate
description: Percentage of shipments dispatched on schedule

name: Fleet Utilization
description: Percentage of available fleet capacity being utilized

name: Average Delivery Lead Time
description: Average time from dispatch to delivery

name: Cold Chain Temperature Breach Instances
description: Number of temperature control violations during transport

name: Distributor Fill Rate
description: Percentage of distributor orders fulfilled completely

name: Lost Sales Value (Estimated)
description: Estimated value of sales lost due to stockouts or service issues

name: Sales Return Rate
description: Percentage of sales returned by customers

name: Retailer Service Level
description: Service level provided to retail partners

name: Competitor Stock Presence in Key Markets
description: Percentage of key markets where competitor products are available

name: Daily Demand Spike Events vs Response Time
description: Average response time to unexpected demand spikes
